items.title: Congresswoman-in-limbo Adelita Grijalva on the dilemma she faces
items.description: Democratic Rep. Grijalva won her special election more than two weeks ago, but House Republicans refuse to swear her into office.

items.title: Trump wants a Nobel Prize. He’ll learn Friday if his campaign paid off.
items.description: President Donald Trump’s long quest for a Nobel Peace Prize has sparked an unusual global scramble.

items.title: Trump announces ceasefire deal to begin ending the war in Gaza
items.description: The president’s announcement says the agreement includes the release of hostages by Hamas and the withdrawal of Israeli troops.
